Title: The Longest Day
Writer: David Shore (created by), Bryan Cranston (created by), Fred Golan (teleplay by), Graham Yost (story by), Ian MacDonald (story editor)
Actors: Giovanni Ribisi, Marin Ireland, Shane McRae, Libe Barer
Plot: With all of the pieces in place, Marius sits down at Vince's poker table to make his final moves. Everything is going according to plan, until Vince becomes suspicious that he's seen this ...
